Title: variantElement
Description: Extracts a column with specified type from a Variant column.

variant — Variant column. Variant.type_name — The name of the variant type to extract. String.default_value - The default value that will be used if variant doesn't have variant with specified type. Can be any type. Optional.
Subcolumn of a Variant column with specified type.
Examples: CREATE TABLE test (v Variant(UInt64, String, Array(UInt64))) ENGINE = Memory;INSERT INTO test VALUES (NULL), (42), ('Hello, World!'), ([1, 2, 3]);SELECT v, variantElement(v, 'String'), variantElement(v, 'UInt64'), variantElement(v, 'Array(UInt64)') FROM test;
